one_reviews_text: Enjoy the simple fun of this game, nice progression and pleasant techno music.

review_title: race the sun in lackluster VR
one_reviews_text:
I love this style of game, but 1. not using a controller as the joystick and 2. not having real speedup mechanics that have weight make it a bit dull. Levels also repeat after 12k or so,

It made me nostalgic for Race the Sun though, and it was $2, so heck.
Ight so look, its not that great buuuut its 4 dollah :/
